CS290.name: Web Development
CS290.description: How to design and implement a multi-tier application using web technologies: Creation of extensive custom client- and server-side code, consistent with achieving a high-quality software architecture.

reviews.title: I love web development!
reviews.text: This is a great class and one that I am glad to have taken!

reviews.title: Websites are cool
reviews.text: I loved making websites! And the server side stuff was cool too

CS261.name: Data Structures
CS261.description: Abstract data types, dynamic arrays, linked lists, trees and graphs, binary search trees, hash tables, storage management, complexity analysis of data structures.

CS325.name: Analysis of Algorithms
CS325.description: Recurrence relations, combinatorics, recursive algorithms, proofs of correctness.
